function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through indoor environments","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases among building occupants","Mitigation":"Effective ventilation systems, surface cleaning, and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and smart sensors for air quality monitoring","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health professionals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
